name: GanapathiBhajan
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ganapathi bhajan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ganesha is thus considered the master of intellect and wisdom. He is depicted as a big-bellied, yellow or red god with four arms and the head of a one- tusked elephant, riding on, or attended to by, a mouse. He is frequently represented sitting down, with one leg raised in the air and bent over the other.

To play Ganesh song in Alexa, Just enable the skill and say:
Alexa, Open Ganapathi bhajan
Alexa, Play Ganapathi bhajan
Alexa, Ask Ganapathi bhajan to play

If you enjoy the skill, please do leave us a review as it helps other people find it and enjoy the skill too
priv:
